content:
# It seems that I encountered an error again while trying to craft the assembling machine. The error indicates that I do not have enough iron gear wheels, as I only have 5, while I need 10.

# To resolve this, I will need to craft more iron gear wheels. Each iron gear wheel requires 2 iron plates. 

# Currently, I have:
# - 12 wood
# - 5 stone
# - 5 iron ore
# - 5 copper plates
# - 11 copper cables
# - 5 iron gear wheels
# - 10 electronic circuits.

# I need to gather more iron ore to craft additional iron plates. Each iron plate requires 1 iron ore, so I will need at least 10 iron ore to craft 10 iron plates for the 5 additional iron gear wheels.

# Let's move to gather more iron ore.
iron_ore_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)
move_to(iron_ore_position)  # Moving to gather iron ore
harvest_resource(iron_ore_position, quantity=10)  # Harvesting more iron ore
print(f"Inventory after gathering more iron ore: {inspect_inventory()}")

# Now, I will smelt the iron ore into iron plates. First, I need to check if I have enough wood to fuel the furnace.
assert inspect_inventory().get(Prototype.Wood, 0) >= 2, "Not enough wood to fuel the furnace."

# Insert the wood for fuel and the iron ore into the furnace for smelting.
insert_item(Prototype.Wood, furnace, quantity=2)  # Inserting wood as fuel
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=10)  # Inserting iron ore to smelt

# Check inventory after these operations.
print(f"Inventory after inserting iron ore into the furnace: {inspect_inventory()}")
print(f"Furnace status after inserting iron ore: {inspect_inventory(furnace)}")

# Wait for the smelting process to finish.
for _ in range(30):  # Maximum 30 seconds wait
    plates = inspect_inventory(furnace)[Prototype.IronPlate]
    if plates >= 10:  # Check if we have enough iron plates produced
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")

# Checking the inventory after smelting.
print(f"Inventory after smelting iron ore: {inspect_inventory()}")
print(f"Furnace status: {inspect_inventory(furnace)}")
